item.title: GM
item.description: score:98 Chances: General Motors (GM) is positioning itself to be a leader in the EV space, with a potential for share gains due to delays in EV investments by competitors such as Ford The company’s Cadillac Lyriq and Chevrolet Blazer EV are expected to temporarily lose eligibility for a U.
